definitions: The action of a liquid washing gently against something.
The action of an animal drinking by scooping up liquid with its tongue.
The action of one thing overlapping another.
The action of being ahead of an opponent by one or more laps in a race.
examples: The waves were lapping against the shore.
The cat was lapping milk from the bowl.
The shingles were lapping over each other.
He was lapping his competitors in the final stages.
